crateKey.name: &4Atomic Mastery Core
lore: &7Unlocks the pinnacle of Mekanism's power and technology

prize.name: &bUltimate Chemical Tank
lore: &7Store massive amounts of any gas, liquid, or slurry
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7has contained ultimate power with an &bUltimate Chemical Tank &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!

prize.name: &6Industrial Turbine
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7generated immense power with an &6Industrial Turbine &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!

prize.name: &dQuantum Entangloporter
lore: &7Instantly transfer items, fluids, and gases across dimensions
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7defied space and time with a &dQuantum Entangloporter &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!

prize.name: &aFusion Reactor Controller
lore: &7The heart of a powerful fusion energy source
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7harnessed the power of the stars with a &aFusion Reactor Controller &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!

prize.name: &9Ultimate Universal Cable
lore: &7Transmit any type of energy without loss
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7connected ultimate power with &9Ultimate Universal Cables &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!

prize.name: &5Ultimate Factory
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7built the ultimate production line with an &5Ultimate Factory &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!

prize.name: &cUltimate Induction Provider
lore: &7Wirelessly transfer and receive massive amounts of energy
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7charged up with &cUltimate Induction Providers &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!

prize.name: &2Advanced Electrolytic Separator
lore: &7Efficiently separate compounds into their constituent elements
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7broke down the elements with an &2Advanced Electrolytic Separator &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!

prize.name: &eUltimate Pressurized Reaction Chamber
lore: &7Perform advanced chemical reactions under extreme conditions
prize.broadcast: &e{player_name} &7engineered complex reactions with an &eUltimate Pressurized Reaction Chamber &7from the &cMekanism Master Engineer Crate!
